full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SPYANG GI MGO CAN GYI BSANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SPYANG GIS GNOD CHEN PO LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS BYAMS PA SNYING RJE SEMS BSKYED LAS, MAH'A K'A LA SKU'I SPRUL GSUM SHES PA RIN PO CHE BLA MA BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^ AER TEN RJE BDUN SKYES SHES PA SPRUL SKU LA LCAM SRING ZHAL GZIGS GIS 'BYUNG, ,BLA MA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DON @003B DU RTA PHYUGS RNAMS SPYANG GIS GNOD PA MANG PA'I PHYIR DU KHRO BO CHEN POS DON ZHI BYAS PA LA SHIN TU NYID DKA' SLAD DU BA'I YI GE'I PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN NO, ,LEGS SO, ,)
